senses.sense_definition: A machine used to coarsely grind or crush grain, beans, or similar materials.

examples.text: The farmer used a <w>kibbler</w> to break down the corn for animal feed.
Maintenance on the <w>kibbler</w> is essential to ensure the grain is ground evenly.

senses.sense_definition: A person whose job is to operate a machine that grinds grain.

examples.text: The <w>kibbler</w> adjusted the settings on the mill to produce a finer meal.
In the past, a <w>kibbler</w> was a common worker in agricultural processing plants.
